title: So yeah.. Ratings won't load?
body:
At the end of every one of my games lately my rating just won't load.. 
its quite annoying cause its nice to see how well I went :D riot plz fix

replies.body: I've had the same problem, i kinda dont care so i just skip / go out of the chat.
Ratings mean jack anyway, but I guess it's annoying if you like looking at it.
Having this same problem but I agree with Strat, the rating doesn't really matter.

tbh the ratings are pretty stupid anyway. I get S in games where I know I've done horribly. Like I get tonnes of kills but I don't do anything to help take objectives and overall I just don't show much control amount the map. The ratings system is liable to make bad players (Silver or below) think that they're doing the right thing when they're not. It's best to ignore them.
